summary: A proof-of-concept module that defines a hierarchical task planning system. It models individual tasks and their relationships, builds a dependency graph, and determines a deterministic execution order using topological sorting. The system executes tasks asynchronously via OpenAI function calls, ensuring parent-child dependencies are respected and duplicate runs are avoided.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to orchestrate complex, dependency-driven workflows with AI function calls, enabling automated planning and execution of multi-step processes in a reliable, ordered manner for AI-powered automation solutions.
